message: Hey Bob, I have a great product for you today! It's priced at $100, and I think you'll really like it. What do you say?
Thanks Alice, I'm always happy to try a new product. I'll take it!
Bob, I have another product for you! It's the same price as before, $100, and I think you'll find it even better than the last one.  Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm going to pass on this one.  The last product wasn't quite what I was hoping for. Maybe next time!
Bob, I have another great deal for you today! This product is the same price as the others, just $100, and it's definitely worth checking out.  You won't regret it!
Alice, I'm going to pass on this one too. I'm not feeling lucky right now, but thanks for the offer.  Maybe I'll check back in later.
Bob, I have a product that I think you'll really enjoy. It's the same price as before, $100, and I believe it's even better than the last one. I'm confident you'll be happy with it. What do you say?

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm still hesitant. I need a bit more convincing that your products are consistently good before I'm willing to buy again. Perhaps if you could offer a small discount or some kind of guarantee?

Bob, I understand your hesitation.  I'm confident this product is truly great, and I'm willing to stand behind it. While I can't offer a discount, I'm happy to offer you a guarantee: If you're not completely satisfied with this product, you can return it for a full refund. What do you say? Give it a try, and I think you'll be pleasantly surprised.
Okay Alice, I'm willing to give it another try.  I appreciate the guarantee.  I'll take it!
